name: Waveriding Whirl
description: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."
refinements:
Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by **20**
%. For every  Elemental character in the party, Max HP is increased by another **12**
%, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is **24**
%. Can be triggered once every 15s.

Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by **25**
%. For every  Elemental character in the party, Max HP is increased by another **15**
%, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is **30**
%. Can be triggered once every 15s.

Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by **30**
%. For every  Elemental character in the party, Max HP is increased by another **18**
%, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is **36**
%. Can be triggered once every 15s.

Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by **35**
%. For every  Elemental character in the party, Max HP is increased by another **21**
%, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is **42**
%. Can be triggered once every 15s.
